reject_logs.fact_text: 전체 1건의 토픽이 이 사유로 보류/개선 중입니다.

issue_card.title: Export Control Impact
issue_card.one_liner: Export controls freeze chip supply chain.
issue_card.kill_switch: Any structural change to export control decree.
issue_card.authority_sentence: Export controls freeze chip supply chain.

trigger_quote.excerpt: Effective immediately, all exports of specialized semiconductor chips to listed entities are suspended pending further technical review.
